name: Dear Aliens...
description:
Hello everyone! 

This is a little game I made for the LAUDA Unity workshop, and I'd like to share it with anyone willing to give it a try. 

You are controlling an UFO to acomplish a very important mission - gather information about Earth's fauna! In order to do that, you must try to collect as many samples of as many species as possible.

Thanks to anyone and everyone who tries it, I really do appreciate it.
